attributes.action: Restore UK Foreign Aid budget commitments
attributes.additional_details:
General Lord Dannatt, former head the British Army says this:

"We are not only stealing from the world’s poorest and most vulnerable, but we are also stealing from British taxpayers by investing in a policy that will ultimately cost us more. "

More details here from the Centre for Global Development:
https://www.cgdev.org/blog/breaking-down-prime-minister-starmers-aid-cut

Email your MP using this template from the charity Tearfund:
https://www.tearfund.org/campaigns/stand-against-uk-aid-cuts
attributes.background: The UK government has recently announced its plans to reduce the international aid budget from 0.5% to 0.3% of GDP.  This after the reduction from 0.7% we had previously committed to.  I want our nation to take its responsibilities seriously and to support those in desperate need around the world.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Restore UK Leadership in Global Development – Reverse Aid Cuts
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/719301
